        Returns the user with the email entered in the datasource
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        User : the user find in the datasource or null if no user has been found

      • update

        int update​(java.lang.Long id,
           User updatedUser)
        Modifies a user in the datasource
        Parameters:
        id - long : the id of the user to be modified
        updatedUser - : the modified information of the user
        Returns:
        int : greater than 0 if the user was in the datasource and it has been updated or 0 if the user could not be found or could not be updated

        Returns:

      • deleteById

        int deleteById​(java.lang.Long id)
        Delete a user in the datasource
        Parameters:
        id - long : the id of the user to be deleted
        Returns:
        int : 0 if the user could not be found or could not be removed; otherwise greater than 0
